CHAPTER 642 Offenses Relating to Property

642.01Definitions.

642.02Theft.

642.03Degree of offense when certain property involved.

642.04Unauthorized use of a vehicle; vehicle trespass.

642.05Unauthorized use of property.

642.06Injuring vines, bushes, trees or crops.

642.07Desecration.

642.08Removal of improvements from real property.

642.09Arson.

642.10Criminal damaging or endangering.

642.11Criminal mischief.

642.12Criminal trespass.

642.121Aggravated trespass.

642.13Tampering with coin machines.

642.14Passing bad checks.

642.15Misuse of credit cards.

642.16Making or using slugs.

642.17Criminal simulation.

642.18Tampering with records.

642.19Securing writings by deception.

642.20Personating an officer.

642.21Defrauding creditors.

642.22Receiving stolen property.

642.23Theft of C.A.T.V. (Repealed)

642.24Determining property value in theft offense.

642.25Determining property value in arson.

642.26Possession of criminal tools.

642.27Possession of property belonging to the Municipality.

642.28Food stamps.

642.29Defrauding motor vehicle insurers.

642.30False statements alleging theft of motor vehicles.

642.31Misconduct involving a public transportation system.

642.32Ethnic intimidation.

642.33Insurance fraud.

642.34Forgery of identification cards.

642.35Identity fraud.

642.36Vehicular vandalism.

CROSS REFERENCES

See section histories for similar State law

Value of written instrument or evidence of debt - see Ohio R.C. 1.07

Parents’ liability for destructive acts of their children - see Ohio R.C. 3109.09

Alteration, injury, removal of traffic control devices - see TRAF. 414.08

Definitions generally - see GEN. OFF. 606.01

“Physical harm to property” defined - see GEN. OFF. 606.01(d)

“Serious physical harm to property” defined - see GEN. OFF. 606.01(f)

“Property” defined - see GEN. OFF. 606.01(j)

Detention of shoplifters and thieves - see GEN. OFF. 606.23

Disposition of property held by Police Division - see GEN. OFF. 606.24
